simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a single software bus command pipe message. Checks the message and command IDs and calls the appropriate routine to handle the message.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes an on-board housekeeping request message.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This message does not affect the command execution counter

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Processes a noop ground command.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para:
Processes a reset counters ground command which will reset the following HS application counters to zero:
Command counter
Command error counter

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Utility function that resets housekeeping counters to zero

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Process an enable critical applications monitor command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Allows the critical applications to be monitored.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Process a disable critical applications monitor command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Stops the critical applications from be monitored.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Process an enable critical events monitor command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Allows the critical events to be monitored.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Process a disable critical events monitor command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Stops the critical events from be monitored.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Process an enable aliveness indicator command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Allows the aliveness indicator to be output to the UART.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Process a disable aliveness indicator command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Stops the aliveness indicator from being output on the UART.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Process an enable CPU Hogging indicator command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Allows the CPU Hogging indicator to be output as an event.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Process a disable CPU Hogging indicator command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Stops the CPU Hogging indicator from being output as an event.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Process a reset resets performed command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Resets the count of HS performed resets maintained by HS.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

briefdescription.para: Process a set max resets command.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Sets the max number of HS performed resets to the specified value.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Checks if the actual length of a software bus message matches the expected length and sends an error event if a mismatch occurs

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message
The expected length of the message based upon the command code

entry.para: Returns TRUE if the length is as expected
Returns FALSE if the length is not as expected

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Manages load requests for the AppMon, EventMon, ExeCount and MsgActs tables and update notification for the AppMon and MsgActs tables. Also releases and acquires table addresses. Gets called at the start of each processing cycle and on initialization.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function gets called when HS detects that a new critical applications monitor table has been loaded or when a command to enable the critical applications monitor is received: it then refreshes the timeouts for application being monitored

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function gets called when HS detects that a new message actions table has been loaded: it then resets the cooldowns for all actions.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None
